name: Let's Make A Game! (eggsy | coda, ashleystrawbelly)
name_original: Let's Make A Game! (eggsy | coda, ashleystrawbelly)
description:
Make a game in your 2nd year of college...and find friends along the way!

A visual novel game where you're a college game design student rooming with three other game design students! Pick between three of then to work with and finish making a game by the end of the semester -- it's pretty much the College Experience TM :)!

Interact with unique characters and navigate an in-game school.

Pick between three different roommates and go on a total of three different hangouts with each of them!

Features humorous dialogue common with college students who don't know what they're doing :')
